response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value at $12,000 to you based on its unique features and benefits. Considering its high quality and the impact it can have on your needs, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $11,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional savings while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for both of us, and I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 11000}
